articles.title: Galaxy S20 will get One UI 5.1 update soon - SamMobile - Samsung news

articles.content: Last year, Samsung promised to release four major Android OS updates to its high-end and some mid-range smartphones. However, the update promise was only for Galaxy S21 and newer phones. The Galaxy S… [+1137 chars]
